name: Marisa's Forest Run
description:
Marisa got caught in a snowstorm while picking mushrooms in the Forest of Magic. Get back home before the storm makes it impossible to go on. Dodge rocks, jump over trees, and avoid snowballs thrown by a shrubbery-shaped-Yukari!

Controls:

  • W / Up arrow: Jump
  • A/D & left/right arrow: Change lane left or right

Submission for Touhou Fan Game Jam 10.

Assets used:
- Weather effects and audio: Ultra Dynamic Sky (Unreal Marketplace)
- Trees (modified): Low Poly Forest  (Unreal Marketplace)
- Footstep audio (wav-only): Footsteps Sounds with Blueprint Setup (Unreal Marketplace)

Graphics driver issues/popup:
When launching the game a warning may pop up about the installed version of the NVIDIA graphics driver having known issues in D3D11. Click "no", the game should still launch fine. If it doesn't launch, let me know and I'll upload a non-jam version that targets DX11.
